content.text: Trial 3/5, Stage 'exit': Please describe the image and compute the stiffness matrix.

The image shows a black groove piece with an angular shape on a wooden surface, with the user's gaze indicated by a red circle at the bottom right of the object. The groove appears to be oriented horizontally.

### Stiffness Matrix
```json
{
  "stiffness_matrix": [
    [250, 0, 0],
    [0, 100, 0],
    [0, 0, 100]
  ]
}
```
